   Literature  inEnglish,  plus  the 
 UTME requirements.  
(viii) FED-OYE EKITI accepts two (2) ‘A’ level passes or 
NCE in two (2) Arts subjects.  
(ix) ILORIN requires ‘A’ level candidates to posses 
English and Literature in English at 'O' level credit 
passes.  
(x) PHC - No Direct Entry.  
(xi) JOS and NFI-DEG accept 'A' level/IJMB pass in 
two (2) or three (3) ‘A’ level passes and other 
certificates in Drama, Mass Communication, 
Communication, Journalism with three (3) 'O' 
level credit passes in relevant subjects including 
Literature in English.  
(xii) KWASU accepts   
a) two (2) ‘A’ level in Arts and one (1)Social 
Science subject.    
b) ND upper credit in visual or Theatre Arts. NCE 
merit in English language, Literature 
inEnglish and any Arts subject.   
c) NCE merit in music and any other Arts 
subject.  
(xiii) LASU accepts  
a) NCE merit in Theatre/Performing/Creative or 
Communication Arts of recognised 
institutions plus five (5) 'O' level credit passes 
to include English Language at not more than 
two (2) sittings.   
b) a recognized certificate in Dramatic Arts plus 
one (1) other certificate in the Humanities 
from a recognized Institution or 'A' level pass 
in any other subject plus five (5) 'O' level 
credit passes including English Language.
